Package nl.rug.aoop.asteroids.model.gameobjects

Class Spaceship

java.lang.Object
nl.rug.aoop.asteroids.model.gameobjects.GameObject
nl.rug.aoop.asteroids.model.gameobjects.Spaceship
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Spaceship extends GameObject implements Serializable
This class represents a player's ship. Like all other game objects, it has a location and velocity, but additionally, the spaceship has a weapon that can be used to shoot bullets to destroy asteroids. The spaceship also slows down over time. You may think this is unrealistic, but imagine for a moment that this spaceship has reaction control thrusters allowing it all 6 degrees of freedom, and that it has an inertial dampening system, like any modern straighter would.

Furthermore, the spaceship has a limited energy supply which is regenerated slowly over time by onboard solar panels. Accelerating, turning, and shooting the weapon all drain some of this energy. If there's not enough energy remaining to perform some action, the spaceship will simply remain idle until it has recharged its batteries.

See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Spaceship

      public Spaceship()
      Constructs a new spaceship with default values. It starts in the middle of the window, facing directly upwards, with no velocity.

    • Spaceship

      public Spaceship​(String nickname)
      Constructs a new spaceship with the default values and the nicknames passed by parameter. Starting in a random position.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the user, owner of the spaceship.

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all parameters to default values, so a new game can be started.

    • nextStep

      public void nextStep()
      Defines how the spaceship moves. This includes rotating the ship if the user is pressing the key to turn the ship, or accelerating the ship, or firing the weapon.
      Overrides:
      nextStep in class GameObject

    • getDefaultStepsUntilCollisionPossible

      protected int getDefaultStepsUntilCollisionPossible()
      Specified by:
      getDefaultStepsUntilCollisionPossible in class GameObject
      Returns:
      The number of steps, or game ticks, for which this object is immune from collisions.

    • getEnergyPercentage

      public double getEnergyPercentage()
      Returns:
      The percentage of energy that is available on the ship, out of the total capacity.

    • canFireWeapon

      public boolean canFireWeapon()
      Returns:
      True if the spaceship may fire a bullet. A spaceship is allowed to fire if its weapon is done cooling down, and it has enough energy, and the user is pressing the button to fire the weapon.

    • isAccelerating

      public boolean isAccelerating()
      Returns:
      true if acceleration button is pressed, false otherwise.

    • setFired

      public void setFired()
      Sets the fire tick counter to its starting value, to begin a new countdown until the weapon can be used again.

    • increaseScore1

      public void increaseScore1()
      Increments score field.

    • increaseScore5

      public void increaseScore5()
      Increments score field.
